name: The Shaking... Demo Reel
description:
The intro:

Hello Gentlemen and Ladies. Please load the reel marked "PICTURESTART" first.

The reels do NOT go in order, as you have to decide which reels to load next when

facing crucial points in the story.  Don't change the reels until you see all your options.

You can re-watch until you make your final decision. This is just a preview of a much larger scaled story. No spoilers here but INTRIGUE! THRILLS! SPILLS! & More!

THE SHAKING!!! Wonderfully unique game mechanism.

To run:

Type in the speed to run each reel. Zero is static and you press the keyboard > arrow

to go to the next frame. This way you can progress at your own speed. Any number

higher than 0 has it automatically play, but it will be harder to read subtitles! Enjoy!

Works on Spectrum ZX emulator. Tested on fuse. Any OS that can emulate zx should

be able to run this.

The feedback:

Please fill out the suggestion Box on your way out: zartan917@aol.com A full length release (full story) is planned for this later this year.  Enjoy.
